name: Mangia
description: Mangia (also styled Mangia', with a trailing apostrophe) is a 1983 video game by Spectravision for the Atari 2600 video game console. The North American (NTSC) version is one of the rarest games for the 2600, and has earned a rating of 10 ("Unbelievably rare") from the AtariAge rarity guide.
